content: a ring or work a magic_ring round 1 chain 3 count as double_crochet 15 double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-3 finish off 16 double_crochet round 2 join b with slip_stitch to any double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in same st popcorn in next double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet around omitting last 2 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 finish off 8 popcorn 16 double_crochet round 3 join a with slip_stitch to the top of any popcorn chain 3 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st around omitting last 2 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 finish off 36 double_crochet round 4 join b with slip_stitch to any double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in same st popcorn in next st 2 double_crochet in next st around omitting last 2 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 finish off 18 popcorn 36 double_crochet round 5 join a with slip_stitch to any double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next st around omitting last 2 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 72 double_crochet round 6 chain 4 count as treble_crochet treble_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet in same st corner made treble_crochet in next 2 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts half_double_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet in next 5 sts half_double_crochet in next 2 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts treble_crochet in next 2 sts 2 treble_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet in next st corner made around omitting last 2 treble_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-4 finish off 21 sts per side 4 chain-2 round 7 join c with single_crochet to any chain-2 corner space half_double_crochet single_crochet in same space single_crochet in next 21 sts single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in next chain-2 space around omitting last 3 corner sts join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet finish off 23 single_crochet per side 4 half_double_crochet round 8 join b with slip_stitch to any corner half_double_crochet beg dtrcl in same st chain 5 dtrcl in same st chain 5 open dtrcl in same st as last dtrcl skip next 5 sts open dtrcl in next st close dtrcl chain 5 4 times * dtrcl in same st as last dtrcl chain 5 twice around ending at * and placing last cluster in beg corner half_double_crochet join last chain-5 with slip_stitch to top of beg dtrcl finish off 40 dtrcl 24 chain-5 © 2018 melinda miller all rights reserved crown join c with single_crochet to any corner chain-5 space
